# Thunder Bay Home Services

## Overview
Thunder Bay Home Services (https://thunderbayhomeservices.com) is the leading local platform for finding, researching, and comparing home service providers in Thunder Bay, Ontario.
Start here: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com

## Mission
To help homeowners make informed decisions when hiring contractors for maintenance, renovations, and emergencies.
We verify providers for insurance and local presence.

## Operator
Operated by Frayze Technologies Inc.
Contact: hello@thunderbayhomeservices.com

## Core Services
We provide guides and contractor connections for:
- **Snow Removal**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/snow-removal
- **Plumbing**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/plumbing
- **HVAC & Heating**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/hvac
- **Electrical**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/electrical
- **Roofing**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/roofing
- **Landscaping**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/landscaping
- **Painting**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/painting
- **Cleaning**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/cleaning
- **Moving Services**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/moving
- **Junk Removal**: https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/junk-removal

## Content
Access our expert guides and seasonal tips:
https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/blog

## For Contractors
Local professionals can apply to join the network:
https://thunderbayhomeservices.com/for-contractors
